original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanāsavo
analyzed: hetu paccayā āsavañca ca iva sa āsavañca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na anāsavaḥ

original: ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca iva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca sāsavañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavañca sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha nava
